survey.name: Survey
survey.res: Please provide valid name of the child.
You have entered an age the same as a previous child – is this correct.
Please review your response. Expenditure on toys cannot be more than the total expenditure.
Please select an answer only if browse website on computer or use Internet on mobile phone.
You’ve entered a wrong numbers or alphabets. Please enter the correct number or alphabet again. You can try 2 more times.
You’ve entered a wrong numbers or alphabets. Please enter the correct number or alphabet again. You can try 1 more time.
Makes me FEEL NEGATIVE about Xero
It does NOT FIT with the Xero brand
DOESN’T make Xero APPEAR DIFFERENT from the other brands
It is NOT RELEVANT to my business or businesses like mine
It makes me LESS LIKELY TO BUY/CONTINUE TO USE Xero in the future
It is NOT RELEVANT to the work I do with clients
It makes me LESS LIKELY TO RECOMMEND/CONTINUE TO USE Xero with my clients in the future

radio.label: LNG
radio.title: Please select the language which you would like to answer this survey in.

radio.label: ratingOrder
radio.title: Record the order of the rating question
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

checkbox.label: changelog
checkbox.title: Will be hidden after live

survey.exec: if (list=="11" or list=="13"): List_sample.val=0 if (list=="12" or list=="14"): List_sample.val=1

radio.label: List_sample
radio.title: Record the Supplier

block.label: b0
block.html:
Thank you for agreeing to take part in this survey. This survey will take approximately 15 minutes to complete.
The data is being collected and collated by an independent marketing research company who will ensure the anonymity of your responses. There are no right or wrong answers, it is your opinion that is important.
Please click on the ‘Continue >>’ button below to begin the survey.

radio.label: S1
radio.title: A few questions about you to start. Are you……

checkbox.label: Agegroup
checkbox.title: AUTOCODE S2 INTO

radio.label: S3
radio.title: Where do you live?

radio.label: S4
radio.title: Which of the following best describers the area where you live?

checkbox.label: S5
checkbox.title: Which of the following do you currently own?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

checkbox.label: S6
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of the following have you purchased in the last 18 months?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

checkbox.label: S7
checkbox.title:
Which, if any, of the following are you seriously considering purchasing in the next 12 months?
By this we mean you have at least started to look into options.
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

checkbox.label: Auto_S8
checkbox.title: Selected in S6 and S7

checkbox.label: S8
checkbox.title: And which, if any, of the following did you seriously considering purchasing in the last 12 months, but decided not to? By this we mean you looked at different options.
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

radio.label: QC1
radio.title: Please select “Strongly agree” from the list below. This is a quality check question.

checkbox.label: quota_group
checkbox.title:
Used in quota
This will be hidden in live

row.label: r2
row.autofill: not(S6.r1 or S6.r2 or S6.r3) and (S7.r1 or S7.r2 or S7.r3)

row.label: r3
row.autofill: (S8.r1 or S8.r2 or S8.r3) and not(S7.r1 or S7.r2 or S7.r3 or S6.r1 or S6.r2 or S6.r3)

checkbox.label: Prog_QUOTA_GROUP
checkbox.title: QUOTA GROUP

row.label: r2
row.autofill: not(S6.r1 or S6.r2 or S6.r3) and (S7.r1 or S7.r2 or S7.r3)

row.label: r3
row.autofill: (S8.r1 or S8.r2 or S8.r3) and not(S7.r1 or S7.r2 or S7.r3 or S6.r1 or S6.r2 or S6.r3)

checkbox.label: QUOTA_GROUP
checkbox.title: QUOTA GROUP

survey.html:
Thank you! You are the type of person we are looking to talk to today. We will be asking questions about the camping trailer / caravan / RV (motorised home) you recently purchased, planned to or are planning to purchase.
Thanks for your time and honesty.

text.label: A1
text.title: Firstly, what brands of camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home) come to mind?
text.comment: Please write as many as you can think of, putting each brand in a separate box.

checkbox.label: A2
checkbox.title: Which, if any, of the following camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home) brands have you heard of (before doing this survey)?
checkbox.comment:
Please make sure you select any that you wrote in the previous question.
Please select as many as apply.
checkbox.row: I'm not sure / I can't remember

radio.label: A3
radio.title: When it comes to camping trailers / caravans / RVs, which best describes how you feel about each of the following brands?
radio.comment: Please select one answer for each brand.
radio.validate: if A3.c1.count gt 1: error("You can select only 1 brand as PREFERRED BRAND.")
radio.row: I'm not sure / I can't remember
radio.col: A brand I would SERIOUSLY CONSIDER
I would NOT CONSIDER this brand
I DON"T KNOW enough about this brand

checkbox.label: auto1
checkbox.title: A2 selected row1-28

row.label: r1
row.autofill: A2.r1 or A2.r2 or A2.r3 or A2.r4 or A2.r5 or A2.r6 or A2.r7 or A2.r8 or A2.r9 or A2.r10 or A2.r11 or A2.r12 or A2.r13 or A2.r14 or A2.r15 or A2.r16 or A2.r17 or A2.r18 or A2.r19 or A2.r20

radio.label: A4
radio.title: Which camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home) brand did you purchase?

textarea.label: A5
textarea.title: And what model camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home) brand did you purchase?
textarea.comment: Please write as much detail as you can remember about the model name.

checkbox.label: B1
checkbox.title: Who is/was involved in decision of which camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home) to purchase?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

textarea.label: B2a
textarea.title: What were the main reasons you chose the camping trailer / caravan / RV that you did?
textarea.comment: Please explain what your decisions was mainly based on as if you were explaining to a friend why you chose what you did.

textarea.label: B2b
textarea.title: What are the main things you are looking for in the camping trailer / caravan / RV that are thinking about buying?
textarea.comment: Please explain the key criteria that will help you decide what to buy.

textarea.label: B2c
textarea.title: What were the main things you are looking for in the camping trailer / caravan / RV that you were thinking about buying?
textarea.comment: Please explain the key criteria that would have helped you decide what to buy.

radio.label: B3
radio.title: How many camping trailers, caravans and RVs have you ever owned?

radio.label: B4
radio.title: How often do you replace or intend to replace your camping trailers, caravans and RVs?

radio.label: B5
radio.title: Did you/will you buy a new or used camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home)?
radio.comment:
If you’ve decided not to buy, what were you considering?
Please select one.

radio.label: B6
radio.title: Where did you buy your camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home)?

radio.label: B7
radio.title: What is the main reason you purchased or intend to purchase your camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home)?
radio.row: Upgrading (buying a better quality / more expensive vehicle)
Trying out for the first time
Replacing a car with a caravan / RV – to use from day to day as well as for holidays

checkbox.label: B8
checkbox.title: Which best describes why you are no longer planning to purchase a camping trailer, caravan or RV (motorised home)?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.
checkbox.row: Decided to spend money on other things
Couldn’t find the brand of camping trailer / RV that I wanted
Couldn’t find the layout that I wanted
Too hard to get to a dealership / caravan show
Purchase was more expensive than I thought it would be
The after care (e.g. repairs, spare parts, insurance etc.) was too expensive

radio.label: C1a
radio.title: How long did it take to purchase, from when you started seriously looking for a camping trailer, caravan or RV, to when you paid the money?

radio.label: C1b
radio.title: How long have you been seriously looking for a camping trailer, caravan or RV?

checkbox.label: C2
checkbox.title: Which of the following did you, or will you look at or consult when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.
checkbox.row: Camping / caravan forums and communities online
Ratings and reviews from current users

col.label: c3
col.cond: B1.r3 or B1.r4 or B1.r5 or B1.r6

checkbox.col: Other family / friends looked at or consulted for me

select.label: C3
select.title: And which three of these do you think was or will be most influential in your decision?
select.comment: Please rank your most influential, second most influential and third most influential.
select.row: Camping / caravan forums and communities online
Ratings and reviews from current users

number.label: D1_1
number.title: When it comes to camping trailers / caravans / RVs, how important is each of the following?

comment.em: Please rate each from 1 to 7 where 1 = not at all important to 7 = extremely important.

number.label: D1
number.title: When it comes to purchasing camping trailers / caravans / RVs, how important is each of the following?

comment.em: Please rate each from 1 to 7 where 1 = not at all important to 7 = extremely important.

p.strong: Availability e.g. in stock or reasonable delivery time
Accessibility – can view vehicle, test drive etc.
Range of brands to choose from
Range of layouts / designs to choose from
Kms on the clock / condition of vehicle
Build quality and materials (e.g. quality of the finish, weatherproofing, insulation, safety features such as smoke alarms etc.)
Size and functionality (e.g. dimensions – size, length, weight, payload, towing capacity, on/off road capability, storage size when not in use etc.)
Features and inclusions (e.g. number of berths, layout, white goods, entertainment, external features etc.)
Environmentally friendly features (e.g. solar panels, rechargeable batteries etc.)
After sales experience (e.g. ease of getting spare parts, repairs and servicing, warranty, being part of a community etc.)

checkbox.label: D1_hidRating
checkbox.title: Individual Flatliner check

row.label: r1
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('1')) and (D1.r2.check('1')) and (D1.r3.check('1')) and (D1.r4.check('1')) and (D1.r5.check('1')) and (D1.r6.check('1')) and (D1.r7.check('1')) and (D1.r8.check('1')) and (D1.r9.check('1')) and (D1.r10.check('1')) and (D1.r11.check('1')) and (D1.r12.check('1')) and (D1.r13.check('1')) and (D1.r14.check('1')) and (D1.r15.check('1')) and (D1.r16.check('1')) and (D1.r17.check('1')) and (D1.r18.check('1')) and (D1.r19.check('1')) and (D1.r20.check('1'))

row.label: r2
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('2')) and (D1.r2.check('2')) and (D1.r3.check('2')) and (D1.r4.check('2')) and (D1.r5.check('2')) and (D1.r6.check('2')) and (D1.r7.check('2')) and (D1.r8.check('2')) and (D1.r9.check('2')) and (D1.r10.check('2')) and (D1.r11.check('2')) and (D1.r12.check('2')) and (D1.r13.check('2')) and (D1.r14.check('2')) and (D1.r15.check('2')) and (D1.r16.check('2')) and (D1.r17.check('2')) and (D1.r18.check('2')) and (D1.r19.check('2')) and (D1.r20.check('2'))

row.label: r3
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('3')) and (D1.r2.check('3')) and (D1.r3.check('3')) and (D1.r4.check('3')) and (D1.r5.check('3')) and (D1.r6.check('3')) and (D1.r7.check('3')) and (D1.r8.check('3')) and (D1.r9.check('3')) and (D1.r10.check('3')) and (D1.r11.check('3')) and (D1.r12.check('3')) and (D1.r13.check('3')) and (D1.r14.check('3')) and (D1.r15.check('3')) and (D1.r16.check('3')) and (D1.r17.check('3')) and (D1.r18.check('3')) and (D1.r19.check('3')) and (D1.r20.check('3'))

row.label: r4
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('4')) and (D1.r2.check('4')) and (D1.r3.check('4')) and (D1.r4.check('4')) and (D1.r5.check('4')) and (D1.r6.check('4')) and (D1.r7.check('4')) and (D1.r8.check('4')) and (D1.r9.check('4')) and (D1.r10.check('4')) and (D1.r11.check('4')) and (D1.r12.check('4')) and (D1.r13.check('4')) and (D1.r14.check('4')) and (D1.r15.check('4')) and (D1.r16.check('4')) and (D1.r17.check('4')) and (D1.r18.check('4')) and (D1.r19.check('4')) and (D1.r20.check('4'))

row.label: r5
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('5')) and (D1.r2.check('5')) and (D1.r3.check('5')) and (D1.r4.check('5')) and (D1.r5.check('5')) and (D1.r6.check('5')) and (D1.r7.check('5')) and (D1.r8.check('5')) and (D1.r9.check('5')) and (D1.r10.check('5')) and (D1.r11.check('5')) and (D1.r12.check('5')) and (D1.r13.check('5')) and (D1.r14.check('5')) and (D1.r15.check('5')) and (D1.r16.check('5')) and (D1.r17.check('5')) and (D1.r18.check('5')) and (D1.r19.check('5')) and (D1.r20.check('5'))

row.label: r6
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('6')) and (D1.r2.check('6')) and (D1.r3.check('6')) and (D1.r4.check('6')) and (D1.r5.check('6')) and (D1.r6.check('6')) and (D1.r7.check('6')) and (D1.r8.check('6')) and (D1.r9.check('6')) and (D1.r10.check('6')) and (D1.r11.check('6')) and (D1.r12.check('6')) and (D1.r13.check('6')) and (D1.r14.check('6')) and (D1.r15.check('6')) and (D1.r16.check('6')) and (D1.r17.check('6')) and (D1.r18.check('6')) and (D1.r19.check('6')) and (D1.r20.check('6'))

row.label: r7
row.autofill: (D1.r1.check('7')) and (D1.r2.check('7')) and (D1.r3.check('7')) and (D1.r4.check('7')) and (D1.r5.check('7')) and (D1.r6.check('7')) and (D1.r7.check('7')) and (D1.r8.check('7')) and (D1.r9.check('7')) and (D1.r10.check('7')) and (D1.r11.check('7')) and (D1.r12.check('7')) and (D1.r13.check('7')) and (D1.r14.check('7')) and (D1.r15.check('7')) and (D1.r16.check('7')) and (D1.r17.check('7')) and (D1.r18.check('7')) and (D1.r19.check('7')) and (D1.r20.check('7'))

radio.label: FlatLiner_D1
radio.title: Hidden for flatliner

checkbox.label: D2a
checkbox.title: Thinking more about build quality and materials when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV, which of these is more important to you?
checkbox.row: Quality of the finish – durable materials, solid construction
Safety features (e.g. smoke alarms, fire extinguishers)
Compliance with AU regulations and safety standards

checkbox.label: D2b
checkbox.title: Thinking more about size and functionality when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV, which of these is more important to you?
checkbox.row: Towing capacity (vehicle required to tow the camping trailer, caravan)
Suitability for specific 'lifestyle' (e.g. off-grid, beachside camping, campgrounds etc.)
Storage space when not in use
Flexibility – can adapt to different types of trips or different types of travellers

checkbox.label: D2c
checkbox.title: Thinking more about features and inclusions when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV, which of these is more important to you?

checkbox.label: D2d
checkbox.title: Thinking more about salespeople when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV, which of these is more important to you?
checkbox.row: Knowledgeable – able to answer my questions
Responsive – gets back to me quickly
Really understands my needs / what I am looking for

radio.label: D2e
radio.title: Thinking more about the after sales experience when buying a camping trailer, caravan or RV, which of these is most important to you?
radio.row: Ease of repairs / getting spare parts

radio.label: D2f
radio.title: You selected KMs on the clock as important in the purchase decision when buying a caravan / RV. How many KMs were you/are you looking for?

checkbox.label: D2g
checkbox.title: Thinking more about where the camping trailer, caravan or RV is manufactured, are there any of these countries or regions that you would prefer that the vehicle was NOT made in?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.
checkbox.row: Being made in none of these countries would stop me buying a vehicle if it was the right one for me

checkbox.label: D2h
checkbox.title: Thinking more about the interior design , which of the following do you find more appealing.

textarea.label: D3a
textarea.title: Apart from making it cheaper, what is the one thing a camping trailer / caravan / RV brand or manufacturer could have done to improve your most recent purchase experience?
textarea.comment: Please why this would have made the purchase experience better for you.

textarea.label: D3b
textarea.title: Apart from making it cheaper, what is the one thing a camping trailer / caravan / RV brand or manufacturer could do to make it easier for you to purchase a camping trailer, caravan or RV?
textarea.comment: Please why this would have made the purchase experience better for you.

radio.label: D4
radio.title: As with many big purchases, there are lots of different trade-offs you can make. Thinking about buying a camping trailer / caravan / RV, what would you trade-off? The choices on the left would be less expense, the choices on the right would be more expensive.

row.label: r1
row.rightLegend: Latest design and lots of extras

row.label: r2
row.rightLegend: A high quality vehicle that will last 5+ years with no/minimal repairs

radio.row: A good quality vehicle that will last a couple of years, with some repairs

row.label: r3
row.rightLegend: A great warranty, including servicing and support for repairs

radio.row: A basic warranty, only covering big issues

row.label: r4
row.rightLegend: Ability to customise design / layout / interior decor

radio.row: Limited manufacturer supplied layouts / design / interior decor

checkbox.label: D5
checkbox.title: If you worked for a manufacturer of camping trailers, caravans or RVs, what is the main thing you would focus on in order to make customers like yourself happy?
checkbox.row: More places to view, test drive and/or buy
Better salespeople (e.g. more knowledgeable, better trained, more responsive etc.)
Ensuring products are as environmentally friendly as possible
Making it easier to find, and compare specifications and key info
Being present at more camping / caravaning shows and events

checkbox.label: prog_E1
checkbox.title: Hidden qsn

checkbox.label: hid_E1
checkbox.title:
Hidden qsn
Max 7 select

checkbox.label: E1
checkbox.title: For each of the following factors, select the brand or brands that you would most associate with that statement. You can pick the same brand for multiple statements, or even no brand for a statement.
checkbox.comment: Please select as many brands as you associate with each statement.
checkbox.row: Vehicles are accessible – to view and test drive
Environmentally friendly features (e.g. solar panels, rechargeable batteries etc.)

checkbox.label: FlatLiner_E1
checkbox.title: Individual Flatliner check
checkbox.row: Flatliner for NONE OF THESE BRANDS

radio.label: E2
radio.title: Before today, had you heard of THL?
radio.row: Yes, but don't really know what they do
Yes and know a little bit about them
Yes and know a lot about them

checkbox.label: E3
checkbox.title: Which of the following would you associate with THL?
checkbox.row: Experienced in building caravans and RVs
A leading company for renting caravans and RVs

textarea.label: E4
textarea.title: When it comes to camping trailers, caravans or RVs, what are the benefits of a publicly listed company?
textarea.comment: Please give as much detail as you can.

checkbox.label: F1
checkbox.title:
Thanks for your time and honesty so far. We have a few more questions about you before we finish.
Which of the following types of holidays have you been on in the last 12 months, or are you planning in the next 12 months?
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.

checkbox.label: F2_Text
checkbox.title: qsn text
checkbox.row: What type of holidays do you like to do in your camping trailer / caravan / RV?
What type of holidays would you like to do in your camping trailer / caravan / RV?

checkbox.label: F2
checkbox.title: [pipe: F2_Text]
checkbox.comment: Please select as many as apply.
checkbox.row: As many modern conveniences as possible

checkbox.label: F3_Text
checkbox.title: qsn text
checkbox.row: What are the things you like most about holidays in your camping trailer / caravan / RV?
What are the things you think you would like most about holidays in a camping trailer / caravan / RV?

checkbox.label: F3
checkbox.title: [pipe: F3_Text]
checkbox.row: Not being tied to one location
Not needing to plan too much / ability to be spontaneous
Ability to get off the beaten path
Physical activities (e.g. hiking, kayaking, biking, climbing etc.)
Meeting other RV / Caravan / Camping enthusiasts

radio.label: F4
radio.title: Where do you place yourself on each of these scales?

row.label: r1
row.rightLegend: I don’t do that much research; I’m happy to rely on my gut or the advice of sales people, friends etc.

radio.row: I do a lot of research before buying 'big ticket' items such as caravans

row.label: r2
row.rightLegend: I like camping/caravaning, but there are lots of other things I like to do as well

radio.row: I would spend everyday camping/caravaning if I could

row.label: r3
row.rightLegend: Being environmentally friendly is important, but I’m not looking for this from my caravan / RV

radio.row: Being environmentally friendly is very important to me; I want my caravan / RV to be as sustainable as possible

row.label: r4
row.rightLegend: I don’t like to compromise on most things; I’d rather spend more time or money and find exactly what I want

radio.row: I’m willing to compromise on most things, especially to save time or money

radio.label: F5
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your current living situation?
radio.row: Living in a share house / living with others
Single parent with children at home
Couple with children who have left home
Single parent with children who have left home

checkbox.label: F6
checkbox.title: How old are the children who are living at home with you?
checkbox.row: I do not have children living at home

radio.label: F7
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your employment status?
radio.row: Not employed and not looking for work

radio.label: F8
radio.title: What is your households annual income, before tax?

text.label: F9
text.title: Thanks so much so answering our questions. So that we can enter you into our prize draw – and notify you if you win – please enter your name and best contact email address below

radio.label: QC3
radio.title: Finally, can we just confirm the following, please select true or false for each.

checkbox.label: checkQC
checkbox.title: RECORD QUILITY OR NOT FROM QC

radio.label: SC
radio.title: Speeder checks
